Title: Relates to reporting requirements for domestic and foreign media entities
Summary: Relates to reporting requirements for domestic and foreign media entities; provides such annual report shall include the country of origin of any foreign investment received or any foreign ownership exceeding ten percent in the previous calendar year; establishes those that violate these reporting requirements shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to reporting requirements for domestic and foreign media entities
